item.title: Re: Silver petals dropping
item.content:encoded:
Here is a guide to ally drops.
Team members:

  • Have Olmek in your team.
  • If you want Silver Petals then have both Shorty and Strawberry in your team.

Here is how to increase the chances:

  • Use the theme Stand by Your Ninja.
  • Use the jutsu I need this.
  • You may use Chasers from the Juicy bar if you really want to. They tend to be expensive.
  • If you want an ally drop that is droped by only one Ally you can use The HoClaus as a team member. Otherwise just have 2 allies in your team along with Olmek.

Nothing else helps you get ally drops.

item.title: Re: Silver petals dropping

Not that it matters too much, but in this case Olmek > Spot

Shorty + Strawberry + Olmek

Doesn't drop as often, but twice as much when it does drop.

Then just stack the regular +drop theme, ramen, etc.

item.title: Re: Silver petals dropping
item.content:encoded: Yeah, my bad on Robogirl. That said though I musta been doing something right because I got silver petals with just Strawberry for about 70% of my missions! Got 50 in under 2 days worth of stamina. Are you sure neither the pooch nor the jutsu affect ally drops?

item.title: Re: Silver petals dropping
item.content:encoded:
Okay, let's take this from the top:

  1. Robogirl doesn't drop Petals, Shorty does.
  2. Spot's Item Find chance only applies to items hidden in missions, not ally drops.
  3. Ditto with Diagnosis jutsu.
  4. And same thing with the Ichi Special Ramen, for that matter.

item.title: Re: Silver petals dropping
item.content:encoded: Okay, if you put Robogirl and Strawberry in your party you double up on your drop chances. Then you add Spot for the 50% item find increase. Then you set the Diagnosis jutsu you get from Haus as your primary for an additional +300% item find rate. The end result is that you will get a silver petal drop almost every mission. If you really want to push it you can spend another 100k jutsu xp at your village ramen shop for another +100% which I imagine does give you a drop every mission. Hope someone finds this helpful.

item.title: Silver petals dropping
item.content:encoded: Though I may have missed it, I didn't see anywhere that mentioned that if you have both Strawberry and Shorty on your team at the same time that it is possible that they will both find silver petals during the same mission. I just had this happen and thought, 'wow, now -that'd- be something helpful to know', especially if you're cranking for those 50 petals and are just a few short.
